channel.title: PI making an NPC start this?

item.title: PI making an NPC start this?
item.dc:creator: @sportpirate sportpirate
item.description:
@sportpirate wrote:

Yea its easy
Go to actionhandler.java
And find where npc shops start
and before that post:

case (npc Id): c.RefreshDungTimer(); c.getItems().addItem(995, 1000000); c.getPA().movePlayer(3315, 5492, 0); c.inDungeoneering = true; c.isSkulled = true; loadDungeonSpawns(); } catch (Exception e){} } break;

where it says nic id put the id of the npc you want to do that

Read full topic
item.source: PI making an NPC start this?

item.title: PI making an NPC start this?
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

Iâ€™m working on dungeoneering for my server and I was wondering if there was any way to make talking to an npc start up this code? In this case I want to make talking to Thok start this:

c.RefreshDungTimer(); c.getItems().addItem(995, 1000000); c.getPA().movePlayer(3315, 5492, 0); c.inDungeoneering = true; c.isSkulled = true; loadDungeonSpawns(); } catch (Exception e){} }
(a section of code from my dungeoneering.java)
If possible, could anyone tell me how to make it happen?
